title: Qualifications for license
context: ยง448H-6 Qualifications for license. No person shall be licensed as an elevator mechanic unless the person has satisfactorily passed the examination administered by the board and satisfactorily completed at least four years of training under the supervision of a licensed elevator mechanic. [L 1971, c 190, pt of ยง1; am L 1973, c 44, ยง1; gen ch 1985, 1993; am L 2004, c 31, ยง2]
